item.description:
Update!
Spoke with the manager and she will reserve a table for us in the area left of the stage. 

 The Ravens are playing at the East Bay Grille on April 5th! Join in for some fun. The bartenders are great at this place! The food is great too, so if you want to come for food at 7:00 before the music, we will be there.

Coming before the band starts is a great idea so you can meet a few people before the music and dancing!

I plan on dancing! (big surprise)

The band goes on at 8:30 and they put out some great sound!
I will send out contact info on Wednesday to those who sign up.  If you need it after that then send me an email. 

Hope to see you there!

Here is my photo so you can find me.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

“The Ravens” will be performing at East Bay Grille this Thursday night April 5th from 8:30 – 11:30pm

Join us at the number one club in the Plymouth area for an evening of great music and the food is outstanding!

group.name: Boston Metro Hike Bike & Social Club

item.name: The Ravens at East Bay Grille in Plymouth
